1493870.name: SAK'D
1493870.description:
In this story-driven weapon-wielding, spell-casting, monster-smashing dose of puzzle-platformer metroidvania fun, you are Sak, a pillow brought to life and hurled into a realm of dreams beset by nightmares!

ğŸŒ Explore Interconnected Realms!

Adventure through vast, detailed environments. Survive dangerous, fractured landscapes as you search for lost artifacts and elusive answers to the riddle of a world falling to darkness.

âš”ï¸ Unleash Your Inner Warrior!

Wield legendary weapons, advance your fighting skills and destroy monsters!

âœ¨ Experience the Magic!

Gain the ability to use elemental spells to vanquish enemies and solve intriguing puzzles.

ğŸ® GAME FEATURES


  • Retro-game inspired classic side-scrolling action.
  • Finely tuned 2D controls. Jump, dodge, dash, cast and slash your way through challenging enemies, environmental dangers, and lethal traps.
  • Explore a vast world and detailed landscapes. Twisting subterranean caverns, scorching deserts, fetid swamps, castles, ancient mountain temples and more. Journey to the source of the realm of dreams, where the fabric of reality shifts and distorts against the onslaught of encroaching nightmares.
  • Beautiful hand-painted parallax environments provide a wonderful sense of depth to a 2D world.
  • Create your own destiny! The realm of dreams is an expansive and open world with a great many secrets. Uncover countless hidden areas and choose which roads you take, which enemies you face and forge your own way forward.
  • Acquire new skills and abilities! Wield powerful weapons to unleash devastating attacks and annihilate your foes, equip enchanted armor, learn arcane elemental magic to overcome obstacles!
  • Equip Items! A plethora of unique items- both natural and magical. Discover ancient relics that offer incredible new powers and abilities.
  • An enormous horde of cute, creepy, and nightmarish characters, all brought to life with traditional hand-crafted 2D classical animation.
  • Over 150 enemies! 17 mid-bosses and 17 monstrously epic end bosses! Face terrifying creatures and overcome ancient evils on your quest through the fractured realm of dreams.
  • An original sound score composed by Brandon Vix and James Thorley to audibly illustrate the epic, haunting and adrenaline-pounding journey.
